EmailTemplate.subject: Ergonomics. Work From Home The Right Way.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-ergo-home-office.aspx?cmp=LPBLGOCT2OCT19EN?cmp=EBICERGOBLOG20EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Are You Sitting Comfortably? <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-ergo-home-office.aspx?cmp=LPBLGOCT2OCT19EN?cmp=EBICERGOBLOG20EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
If youâ€™ve just started working from home, now is the perfect time to start working ergonomically. Learn how correct posture and positioning can combat stress and strain on your body, creating a happier and healthier home office.
Get Comfortable <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-ergo-home-office.aspx?cmp=LPBLGOCT2OCT19EN?cmp=EBICERGOBLOG20EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
